function EP03_09()
    --.起-7【7月第4週】「異変」
    SaveData.Title = "異変"

    --//BG：男子部教室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    MSG([[Today, the boys' club gathered earlier than usual and started preparing the necessary documents for the Hakuyou Festival event.]])
    --//BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0136.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "Alright, all that's left is to submit the documents."]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0137.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "Thanks to Minato working with Miss Erika to fill out the sections that the girls' club needed, it really helped."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0444.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Smile "The girls' club seems really cooperative too. Maybe everyone wanted to cooperate with the boys' club somewhere deep down."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0048.wav")
    MSG([[【Mask Senpai #1】Normal "Don’t let your guard down."]])

    MSG([[Mask Senpai #1 warned me seriously.]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0049.wav")
    MSG([[【Mask Senpai #1】Normal "The first-years being cooperative is all thanks to Miss Erika."]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0029.wav")
    MSG([[【Mask Senpai #2】Normal "The second-years and above, who witnessed our sexual harassment incident firsthand, surely hold deep hostility toward the boys' club."]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0032.wav")
    MSG([[【Mask Senpai #3】Normal "Though we are the culprits... it's not really our place to say that."]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0138.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "Exactly right. You guys are one reason the girls' club dislikes us."]])

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0006")
    MSG([[【Seniors】Normal "Yes..."]])
    --//BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0445.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Sadness "Ouga-kun, that’s too harsh. The seniors are reflecting on it now, you know."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0139.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "I know that too. Because the current boys' club troubles stem from our past debts, I'm saying we must give it our all."]])

    MSG([[Ouga confidently poked his thick chest with his thumb. Then, as usual, he wore a confident smile.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0140.wav")

    MSG([[【Ouga】Smile "I'll provide the seniors with the best chance to redeem themselves from infamy by putting on a joint play with the girls' club."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0141.wav")

    MSG([[【Ouga】Laughter "Leave everything to me! Haaa—hahaha!"]])

    MSG([[Hearing that usual laugh, I felt a little relieved. Ouga had genuinely thought about the seniors in his own way.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//SE：引き戸の音
PLAY_SE("SEb004.wav")
WAIT(300)

    --//BU：ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0120.wav")
    MSG([[【Daria】Normal "Sorry to keep you waiting. I got permission, so it’s okay to enter the girls' club building now."]])

    MSG([[Daria opened the classroom door and appeared. The boys' club are generally prohibited from contacting the girls' club and entering their building.]])

    MSG([[To submit the documents inside, prior staff permission was necessary.]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0121.wav")
    MSG([[【Daria】Normal "Uran is still organizing the documents in the Japanese-style room, so if the representative goes to submit, there shouldn’t be any problem receiving them."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0446.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Smile "Thank you very much, Daria-san! To do this much for the boys' club..."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0122.wav")

    MSG([[【Daria】Smile "Don’t say such formal things. You and I play together almost every day, don't we?"]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0123.wav")

    MSG([[【Daria】Normal "As I hold the position of ‘Princess’, I can’t openly promote interaction with the boys' club, but this level of cooperation is no trouble at all."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0142.wav")

    MSG([[【Ouga】Smile "Thanks for your cooperation, Daria Himegami. I’ll repay this debt tenfold in tonight’s game."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0124.wav")

    MSG([[【Daria】Smile "Your debts are almost at their limit. I expect early repayment from you."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)

    --//BG：男子部校舎前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG021ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    --//BG：校舎前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    --//BG：1F廊下（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[Representing the boys' club, Ouga and I headed to the girls' club to submit the documents.]])

    MSG([[We walked side by side down the first-floor hallway with the Japanese-style room. Though I’m used to this hallway now, walking here with my real face for the first time since the entrance ceremony felt a little fresh. My heart was pounding.]])

    --//BU：オウガ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[But Ouga, who should be walking here for the first time, was as composed as ever—a truly strong heart.]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0143.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "Hold your chest high, Minato. We have nothing to be ashamed of."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0447.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Wry smile "Y-yeah, that’s true."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0144.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "By the way, I’ve wondered since the boys' club, why have you been carrying your bag tucked under your arm all day?"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0448.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Flustered "Th-this? Well, umm, actually Erika asked me to run an errand for a book. I’m carrying the bag to make sure I don’t forget the book I bought."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0145.wav")

    MSG([[【Ouga】Smile "I see. Since you sometimes make silly mistakes, that’s a smart precaution."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0449.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Flustered "Ah, hahaha."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[I was startled by the unexpected comment. The bag is actually packed with my uniform and makeup items for cross-dressing.]])

    MSG([[Today, there was a discussion scheduled right after the girls' club in the boys' club, so I couldn’t return home. I undressed from cross-dressing in the multipurpose restroom.]])

    MSG([[I managed to remove everything without issue, but after becoming my real self, I realized I hadn’t thought at all about where to hide the discarded uniform and cross-dressing items.]])

    MSG([[In the end, I decided to carry them with me at all times—that’s how today went.]])

    MSG([[As Ouga said, I am too careless.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0450.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Wry smile "But still, Ouga-kun is amazing. Even though it’s his first time walking in the girls' club, he’s so confident."]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0451.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Wry smile "I’m scared, and my legs are shaking right now."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0146.wav")

    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "Hmph, I think you and Miss Erika are the impressive ones."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0452.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Surprised "W-what do you mean?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//SE：乱暴に頭を撫でる音
PLAY_SE("SEa029.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[Ouga laughed, patting my head roughly.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0147.wav")

    MSG([[【Ouga】Smile "I can tell just by watching that your family has a timid nature. But both you and Miss Erika take a step forward when it counts, right?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0148.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Smile "Just like you’re beside me now. Just like Miss Erika fought through the Princess Election. You move forward on shaky legs."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0149.wav")

    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "That fearful step forward is heavy. It’s different from a fearless man born as a king like me—it's genuine courage."]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0150.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "Even if others don’t see it, I appreciate it. Having a brave friend like you makes me truly happy."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0453.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Cry laugh "Ouga-kun..."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0151.wav")

    MSG([[【Ouga】Smile "That crybaby trait is a bit annoying though. Now, before today’s class starts, let’s quickly deliver the documents to Uran Ryuguuin."]])

    MSG([[And while chatting, we arrived at the Japanese-style room. Ouga instructed me to wait outside and went in alone holding the documents.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0454.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Flustered "A-alone is okay? Isn’t it smoother if I, Erika’s cousin, go in with you...?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0152.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Smile "With your legs shaking? Don’t be stubborn."]])

    MSG([[Pointed out, I finally noticed my trembling legs.]])

    MSG([[I had been trying not to think about it, but talking up close to Uran in my real face carried a high risk of being discovered.]])

    MSG([[My body might be reacting out of fear.]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0153.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Smile "You don’t need to push yourself just to hand over one document. Wait outside the room."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0154.wav")

    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "Besides... Uran Ryuguuin and I have a complicated situation. Since this is a good chance, I’ll talk to her alone."]])

    MSG([[Saying that, Ouga opened the door and entered the room.]])

    MSG([[Just before the door closed, he said to me:]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0155.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】Normal "If anything happens, I’m counting on you, Minato."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0455.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Serious "Yeah, leave it to me."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

STOP_BGM(1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//BG：1F廊下（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//SE：虫の鳴き声
PLAY_SE("SEe005.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[However, Ouga didn’t come back for a long time. The sun had already set, and the boys' club class start time had long passed.]])

    MSG([[Could something have happened? I felt an unusual unease that wouldn’t stop.]])

STOP_SE("SEe005.wav")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0456.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Serious (It’s taking way too long. Maybe I should go inside... but then again, I might not be of any help once I’m inside.)]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[Should I act or not? Time passed while I kept debating when suddenly—]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0156.wav")
    MSG([[【Ouga】 "I said this is no time to worry about home!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0119.wav")
    MSG([[【Uran】 "Your arrogance is what troubles us!"]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0120.wav")
    MSG([[【Uran】 "It seems you will have no choice but to be suspended after all!"]])

    MSG([[From inside the Japanese-style room came the angry voices of two familiar people. Moreover, the conversation included the ominous word ‘suspension.’]])

    --//SE：暴れる音（ドタバタ）
PLAY_SE("SEa027.wav")
WAIT(800)

    MSG([[Then sounds of a violent struggle could be heard.]])

    MSG([[Clearly something’s wrong. I can’t just leave it be.]])

    MSG([[Although Uran is a ‘Princess’, and I might not be able to do anything in my real face, I must enter the room immediately!]])

    MSG([[But then—another option appeared in my head.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0457.wav")
    MSG([[【Minato】Surprised "If I were in Erika’s form... maybe I could resolve this trouble."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[That’s right. I have no power at all.]])

    MSG([[But ‘Erika Ikusa’ has the same authority as Uran-san.]])

    MSG([[And fortunately, the bag I’m holding contains my cross-dressing tools.]])

    MSG([[If I go to the multipurpose restroom on the field now, cross-dress, and come back, that should be enough time.]])

    MSG([[It’s do or die: enter the room now, or take the time to cross-dress and return.]])

    MSG([[In this clearly dangerous situation, what I should do was obvious.]])

    -- //SE：走る音
    PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")

    MSG([[As soon as I decided, I started running. I couldn’t afford to worry about appearances anymore.]])

    MSG([[Right now, I must cross-dress and, as Erika Ikusa, save Ouga-kun from his crisis.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 500,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_10")

end
